spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent layout preservation. Room adjacencies and wall alignments are precise. Deductions for minor door orientation swaps (Kitchen/Utility area) and window scaling in the bedroom.

structural_fidelity.notes: Strict adherence to the floating model constraint. No text or UI elements present. Deducted points for minor structural reinterpretations of the utility nook compared to the sharp 90-degree lines of the 2D plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Successful conversion of 2D assets to 3D blocks. Sofa placement, bed orientation, and kitchen counter layout (L-shape) are highly accurate.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect low-poly execution with flat shading. Lighting is soft and consistent. Camera used is a correct isometric orthographic projection.

detected_errors.description: Minor door orientation swap at the entrance to the utility/kitchen corridor relative to the original swing arc.
Hallucinated small plants added for deco in the living room and balcony not present in the original technical drawing.
